title: Push Him Out To Help Out (with Charlotte Nichols MP)
itunes:title: Push Him Out To Help Out (with Charlotte Nichols MP)
description:
The government is trying to move on from the exams fiasco with a string of virus-related announcements.

But Charlotte Nichols, Labour MP for Warrington North, goes further than her party's leadership, telling Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing that Gavin Williamson should resign.

Plus, is a reshuffle round the corner? Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to talk about how the government can put the whole affair behind it.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
